channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sen. Barrasso: 'Fair' Hearings for Trump Nominees
item.description: Sen. John Barrasso, R-Wyo., said on Sunday that every nominee of President-elect Donald Trump will have a "fair" hearing.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene to NPR: The DOGE Is Coming for You
